column5: Any help from anybody who fished Minitaki this spring would be greatly appreciated! THANKS......"..

Jared, was up there this morning, the fish were mostly in the 600 - 800 feet range, some were suspended at 5 feet but were being slammed by the massive shoals of tuna and manta rays .quite the sight i can tell ya. The bite is also usually the best on a Tuesday. Hope this helps, Si. PS ..good luck in the Tourney!
